title: How to Make Broiled Bacon

steps.headline: Place bacon slices close together in hot skillet over medium heat.
Turn bacon as it broils, and as fat accumulates, pour it off.
Drain on absorbent paper before serving.
Place bacon slices close together in shallow pan, and cook in moderate oven (350̊ F.), turning once, until brown.
Drain on absorbent paper before serving.
Place bacon slices close together on rack in broiler pan.
Place pan in oven with bacon inches from broiler unit.
Broil for 2 minutes on one side.
Turn, and broil for 2 minutes on the other side.

text: Pan Broiled Place bacon slices close together in hot skillet over medium heat.  Turn bacon as it broils, and as fat accumulates, pour it off.  Drain on absorbent paper before serving.  Oven Broiled Place bacon slices close together in shallow pan, and cook in moderate oven (350̊ F.), turning once, until brown.  Drain on absorbent paper before serving.  Cooked on a Broiler Place bacon slices close together on rack in broiler pan.  Place pan in oven with bacon inches from broiler unit.  Broil for 2 minutes on one side.  Turn, and broil for 2 minutes on the other side.
